fields.name: Shinrin Yoku
fields.description: Escape to a peaceful retreat surrounded by stunning nature. This lodge offers breathtaking views of the Japanese countryside and is nestled near picturesque mountains and serene lakes.

fields.name: Villa Lucinda
fields.description: Indulge in the beauty of Italy with this heartwarming lakefront villa. Enjoy breathtaking views of the crystal-clear lake, surrounded by abundant greenery and astonishing mountains.

fields.name: Gudmundur's Cabin
fields.description: Experience the untouched beauty of Iceland with this cozy cabin nestled amidst breathtaking landscapes. Immerse yourself in the tranquility of nature, surrounded by stunning mountains and pristine lakes.
